content.raw:
Thanks for the fix!

I did a diff between the version of atlas_v4_simple_shapes.urdf in this pull request and the one I attached to #492. No differences in the arms, so that looks good to me. There are some differences in the collision geometry for the glut links and the torso, but it looks like those originate from dc5bb3a.

Thanks for the fix!
